title: SOLD The Photographic Cards of Goodwin ... Plus Lipset
author: powderfinger

posts.post_title: SOLD The Photographic Cards of Goodwin ... Plus Lipset
posts.post_content: Does anybody need a copy of "The Photographic Cards of Goodwin and Co...?"  I have a copy that looks brand new and would like $40 plus postage.  Email me at [url]raynovak52@gmail.com[/url] if you're interested.

Moved out of my home of the last 33 years and came across this while packing.  Does anybody still need one? 

I also have the 3-in-one Lipset volume of early 20th Century cards.  $20 for that one or $50 for both.
Both book have been sold.  Thanks for looking.
